required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Randomised, Controlled Study to Assess Safety and Tolerance of Infant Formula With Prebiotics and Postbiotics in Healthy Infants.
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomised, Controlled, Double-blind, Parallel Group, Multi-country Study to Investigate the Safety and Tolerance of Infant Formula With Prebiotics and Postbiotics in Healthy Term Infants.

brief_summary.textblock: A randomised, controlled, double-blind, parallel group, multi-country study to investigate the safety and tolerance of infant formula with prebiotics and postbiotics in healthy term infants.

primary_outcome.description: from baseline until the age of 17 weeks (test product versus control product). Weight gain will be calculated as weight (in grams) at visit minus weight at baseline divided by the number of days.

arm_group.description: Cow's milk based infant formula containing prebiotics and postbiotics
Cow's milk based infant formula without prebiotics and postbiotics

facility.name: Poliklinika Ginekologiczno-Położnicza Sp. z o.o. Sp. k.
